ing: 2 teaspoons sugar-free lemonade-flavored drink mix, such as Crystal LightÂ®
1 1/2 (6 ounce) containers strawberry cheesecake-flavored yogurt, such as YoplaitÂ®
des: "Wonderful also with lemonade drink mix and Key Lime Pie yogurt instead of Strawberry Cheesecake."
ins: Prepare drink mix according to package directions. Combine with yogurt. Pour into ice pop molds and freeze until firm.
